Review Text: I loved this hotel so much! The rooms were well decorated and spacious. It was my first time in Nigeria and I was worried about eating the local food but the food at the hotel was amazing! I also loved that we did not have to worry about a language barrier, the staff were very helpful and recommended places for us to see during our stay. 5/5 for me!

The receptionists are very friendly and efficient. i get quick response to my request. Very neat environment and rooms... I get value for my money, super location... at a walking distance from the palms Shoprite shopping center. e.t.c

I really had a great stay ,felt as if I wasn't away from home. The services was fantastic. The gym helped me a lot in keeping fit and knowing my weight....smiles....you haven't lodge there u need to..

Stayed over for three nights at Charlies and had a good experience. Its situated rightly as access to the major spots of the city is just between 5-30 minutes drive depending on where. Would like for them to change their stylish but functionally unhygienic bathroom taps and also get a seemless transition from grid to generator. Otherwise, they are good, managed and serviced by ever smiling (genuinely) happy people.
Room Tips: They usually give you the best

Review Text: The location is just at the right spot for a first timer in Nigeria. The environment is just outstanding especially the security. A getaway that am not not sure to forget easily. It's truly a real home away from home!!!
